element.short: Alter bei der Geburt des 1. Kindes

element.short: Alter bei der Geburt des letzten Kindes

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.GetIndividual
element.short: Ermittelt und geht zu einer Person

element.short: Liefert Datensatz einer Hochzeit der aktuellen Person

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.GetMarriagesCount
element.short: Anzahl der Hochzeiten der aktuellen Person

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.TestStreamHeader
element.short: Prüfe Stream auf einen Header (hier Übergabe an TIndCls)

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.IndexOf
element.short: Liefert den Index eines Datensatz (hier Übergabe an TIndCls)

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.GetData
element.short: GetData extracts or calculates Data from the Genealogy

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.PeekInd
element.short: PeekInd retreives the data of an individual (without going there)

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Individual
element.short: property Individual read and writes Individuals

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.ActualInd
element.short: Propery ActualInd read and writes the actual individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.ActualMarriage
element.short: property ActualMarriage reads and writes the actual marriage

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Father
element.short: property Father retreives the Indvidual-Data from the father of the actual individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Mother
element.short: property Mother retreives the Indvidual-Data from the mother of the actual individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.iData
element.short: property iData reads and writes Individual-Data

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.mData
element.short: property iData reads and writes Marriage-Data

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.SpouseCount
element.short: property SpouseCount reads the count of spouses of an individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Spouse
element.short: property Spouse retreives individual-data from a spouse of the actual indvidual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.MarriageData
element.short: property MarriageData reads and writes marriage-data of actual Individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.SetMarriageData
element.short: SetMarriageData writes the Marriage-Data of an Individual;

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.GetCount
element.short: GetCount reads the count of individuals

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.PlaceCount
element.short: property PlaceCount reads the number of places

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.SourceCount
element.short: property SourceCount reads the number of sources

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Child
element.short: property Child retreives individual-data from a child of the actual indvidual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.ChildCount
element.short: property ChildCount reads the number of children of an individual

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.IndividualCount
element.short: property IndividualCount reads the number of individuals

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.MarriagesCount
element.short: property MarriageCount reads the number of marriages

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.OnStateChange
element.short: property OnStateChange reads and writes the StateChange-notification-event

element.name: TClsHejGenealogy.Marriages
element.short: Gives access to the Marriages Class
